metadata.title: CVE-2023-52631 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Fix an NULL dereference bugThe issue here is when this is called from ntfs_load_attr_list().  The"size" comes from le32_to_cpu(attr->res.data_size) so it can't overflowon a 64bit systems but on 32bit systems the "+ 1023" can overflow andthe result is zero.  This means that the kmalloc will succeed byreturning the ZERO_SIZE_PTR and then the memcpy() will crash with anOops on the next line.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
